bibl.title: The Excavations at Ismant el-Kharab 1995/6 and 1996/7: A Brief Report.
bibl.note: The excavations were conducted in 4 parts of the site: the East Church, the colonnaded hall, the residential quarter, the Main Temple of Tutu (papyrus' finds, ostraka, wooden boards, coins).
bibl.seg: HOPE Colin A. and Gillian E. BOWEN, The Excavations at Ismant el-Kharab 1995/6 and 1996/7: A Brief Report.
The excavations were conducted in 4 parts of the site: the East Church, the colonnaded hall, the residential quarter, the Main Temple of Tutu (papyrus' finds, ostraka, wooden boards, coins).
